about_the_game:
Legion of Judgment is a 2.5D Metroidvania game, a growth-type farming RPG game with deepened action. You must hide among humans and fight a lone war against the werewolf guild that has taken over the world. It is your duty to manage the old hotel during the day and attack the werewolf guild at night to earn income and develop the hotel to rebuild the Judgment Legion. But now you have lost all your abilities along with your memories of the past. You must explore your own head to regain lost memories and powers.

The fusion of belt-scroller combat and metroidvania

Use various action linkages and action systems such as canceling and parrying to engage in spectacular swordsmanship battles with enemies holding automatic weapons.



Farming gear with diverse effects, character growth

Grow character abilities based on the level up system, collect equipment with various effects, and clear difficult areas more easily.

Realistic backdrop with vivid combat mission stages

A mission stage where the main objective is to clear. To achieve your goal, you are free to play as a silent assassin or a loud brawl.


A non-linear adventure to recover lost power and memories

The Mind Palace stage where you have to explore seamlessly and non-linearly. You can explore every nook and cranny of the memory palace stage, which is non-linearly configured, in search of lost abilities and memories in your memory.

The revival of a rundown hotel, a saga towards the Legion of Judgment

As the CEO of the hotel during the day, you must manage and develop the old hotel, and eventually use it as a hideout for the Legion of Judgment. Develop the hotel to gather more legion members and use their abilities to win the war against the Werewolf Guild.
